title: Got a skin I don't own.
body:
Alright, I was in normal draft when I picked Ahri as my supp champ, just to see if she could do it. Then, another player says that he wanted to play Ahri. I said let's trade then, you take Ahri, I take Lux. We do just that, pick our skins and we start the game. 

Now, the only skin I own for Lux is Star Guardian Lux and the other guy was going to use Challenger Ahri. Loading screen comes up and I'm Imperial Lux and she's Schoolgirl Ahri. Thought it was just a random glitch that had random skins pop up for us,so didn't think much of it.

We get in game and, lo and behold, we are Imperial Lux and Schoolgirl Ahri.

Luckily, we didn't keep the skins afterwards and I thought Imperial Lux was kind of boring to look at. But, just wanted to let people know that haven't posted this little problem yet that it's happened to me and you don't keep the skin you get stuck with. 

No Final Boss Veigar for you, no skins for whatever this champ is {{champion:83}}, and no cigar on Graves.

replies.body:
Hey Smallegreen,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are investigating.
I get pax tf with this can I keep it? Q.Q pweeeeeese played about 10 pax tf games in a row
Same happens when i switch from a champ I have a skin selected to a champ i don't own the skin in that slot for. Had a fun game as warring kingdom J4 because i owned executioners Mundo and traded.

Happened to me after I traded with a friend during a normal game. I ended up getting Arcade MF, which I can assure you I want to buy now. I thought it was a Riot preview or something - teasing me into buying it.

>We get in game and, lo and behold, we are Imperial Lux and Schoolgirl Ahri.

THE SAME THING HAPPENED TO ME AND I SWITCH teemo and Gnar with someone! I got hppy elf teemo! 

http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/LOMNNYQ.jpg

I think it has something to do with switching champions!
I got pax tf with the glitch also Q.Q wish I could keep it they got my hopes up
